full_text: Hey Rocky, great to have you here. >> Hey, so can you tell me what's new with voice? >> Absolutely. Voice is now built right into our chat, so you get a live transcript as we talk. Plus, I can show you things like maps, weather, and more in real time. >> Okay. Okay. Can you show me a map of the best bakeries in the Mission District? [music] >> Sure. Here's a map of the top bakeries in the Mission District. As you'd expect, Tartine is right up there as a favorite. >> Tartine. Okay. What kind of pastries do they have? [music] >> So, at Tartine, they've got some beloved pastries like their morning butter, which is buttery and cinnamon sweet, classic flaky croissants, rich pano chocolat, and even a fran Japan croissant filled with almond cream. >> Sorry, how do you pronounce that one? The fran. >> Yeah, no problem. It's pronounced franapan. So, kind of like fran. >> Okay, amazing. Thank you.
